乌兹别克斯坦宣布独立
联合国安理会通过对卢旺达的武器禁运
美国前总统卡特获诺贝尔和平奖

en.title: Saturday Night Live premiered on NBC.
Reagan and Gorbachev met in Reykjavik for arms control talks.
Clarence Thomas confirmed as a Supreme Court Justice.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average closed above 6,000 for the first time.
Space Shuttle Discovery launched on mission STS-92.
U.S. Congress authorized President Bush to use force against Iraq.
The Chemical Weapons Convention won the Nobel Peace Prize.
Catalan President Carles Puigdemont suspended declaration of independence.
New York Yankees manager Aaron Boone signs a three-year contract extension.
